MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Old Kirk Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:40pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations being required near the Scotland Drive substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:04pm on Tuesday, 16 March 2021.
